item.title: Google is adding "Projects" feature to Gemini to run research tasks
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: Google's Gemini is now testing a new feature called "Projects." This will be similar to OpenAI's Project Feature for ChatGPT. [...]

item.title: U.S. seizes $2.8 million in crypto from Zeppelin ransomware operator
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice (DoJ) announced the seizure of over $2,800,000 in cryptocurrency from alleged ransomware operator Ianis Aleksandrovich Antropenko. [...]

item.title: Anthropic: Claude can now end conversations to prevent harmful uses
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI rival Anthropic says Claude has been updated with a rare new feature that allows the AI model to end conversations when it feels it poses harm or is being abused. [...]

item.title: OpenAI prepares Chromium-based AI browser to take on Google
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI is testing an AI-powered browser that uses Chromium as its underlying engine, and it could debut on macOS first. [...]

item.title: Leak: ChatGPT cheaper plan costs $4 or £3.50, might release everywhere
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI is working on a cheaper plan called ChatGPT Go, and we previously thought it would be just limited to a few regions like India, but that may not be the case. [...]

item.title: OpenAI is improving ChatGPT voice mode
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: ChatGPT's Voice mode is already pretty good, but OpenAI is working on a new feature that will allow you to control how Voice mode actually works. [...]

item.title: Researcher to release exploit for full auth bypass on FortiWeb
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A security researcher has released a partial proof of concept exploit for a vulnerability in the FortiWeb web application firewall that allows a remote attacker to bypass authentication. [...]

item.title: Microsoft Teams to protect against malicious URLs, dangerous file types
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft recently revealed that it's currently enhancing protection against dangerous file types and malicious URLs in Teams chats and channels. [...]

item.title: Colt Telecom attack claimed by WarLock ransomware, data up for sale
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: UK-based telecommunications company Colt Technology Services is dealing with a cyberattack that has caused a multi-day outage of some of the company's operations, including hosting and porting services, Colt Online and Voice API platforms. [...]

item.title: Cisco warns of max severity flaw in Firewall Management Center
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Cisco is warning about a critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in the RADIUS subsystem of its Secure Firewall Management Center (FMC) software. [...]

item.title: Microsoft reminds of Windows 10 support ending in two months
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has reminded customers that Windows 10 will be retired in two months after all editions of Windows 10, version 22H2 reach their end of servicing on October 14. [...]

item.title: Plex warns users to patch security vulnerability immediately
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Plex has notified some of its users on Thursday to urgently update their media servers due to a recently patched security vulnerability. [...]
